content.title: Games
content.description: Explore and play a variety of fun and challenging games.

items.description: Slide and merge tiles to reach the elusive 2048 tile.

items.title: Hangman
items.cardTitle: Hangman: Guess the Word Before Time Runs Out!
items.description: Guess the word before its too late.

items.title: Minesweeper
items.cardTitle: Minesweeper: Can You Defuse the Danger?
items.description: Find all the mines without detonating them.

items.title: Snake
items.cardTitle: Snake: Slither Your Way to Victory!
items.description: Eat, grow, and avoid hitting the walls!

items.title: Sudoku
items.description: Solve challenging puzzles with logic and skill.

items.title: Tic Tac Toe
items.cardTitle: Tic Tac Toe: Classic Fun, Endless Strategy!
items.description: Outsmart your opponent in this classic game.

items.title: Wordle
items.cardTitle: Wordle: Guess the Word and Show Off Your Smarts!
items.description: Guess the 5-letter word in six attempts or less.
